title: Danny & Kathy Najimy (Actor/Activist, Hocus Pocus)
itunes:title: Danny & Kathy Najimy (Actor/Activist, Hocus Pocus)
itunes:subtitle: Danny welcomes queen, icon, and legend Kathy Najimy to Everything Iconic. They discuss her memorable roles in the Sister Act franchise, Hocus Pocus, Kathy and Mo, her activism, charity work, and SO much more. *Episode recorded April 13. YOUTUBE: htt...
description:
Danny welcomes queen, icon, and legend Kathy Najimy to Everything Iconic. They discuss her memorable roles in the Sister Act franchise, Hocus Pocus, Kathy and Mo, her activism, charity work, and SO much more. *Episode recorded April 13.


YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/dannypellegrino1

For tickets to the Chicago live show: https://bit.ly/3bc6QLX

*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic

LINKS:

Twitter.com/DannyPellegrino

Instagram.com/DannyPellegrino

Facebook.com/PellegrinoDanny

Cameo.com/DannyPellegrino

T-shirts: EverythingIconic.store/

EverythingIconic.com

*Sponsored by SamsonTech.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
